imdb.plot outline: A boy is found dead in the dark woods of Misty Falls, Washington. The local sheriff suspects murder, but with no proof, no leads, no suspects and no witness's...she is forced to seek help from an old friend. Now with time running out and mysterious forces creeping ever closer, the two of them are picking up the pieces off the crooked trail hoping that once this puzzle is put back together, their sanity isn't shattered.
imdb.title: Polar Bear
plot: A boy is found dead in the dark woods of Misty Falls, Washington. The local sheriff suspects murder, but with no proof, no leads, no suspects and no witness's...she is forced to seek help from an old friend. Now with time running out and mysterious forces creeping ever closer, the two of them are picking up the pieces off the crooked trail hoping that once this puzzle is put back together, their sanity isn't shattered.::Mason Cross
